title: Kostelooscoin
author: Kostelooscoin
created_time: January 09, 2023, 11:54:36 AMLast edit: January 09, 2023, 12:06:31 PM by Kostelooscoin
content: HelloLately, I have created an absolutely sublime crypto casino.Small demo available right here: https://demoscript.online/18 games available, a crispy admin panel and hundreds of options like the biggest online casinos.The source is custom ~50% to have something nice and clean and unique.It is made in PHP with Laravel and for the db it is MongoDB.I will set a quota of 0.01 BTC which seems reasonable to avoid the leeching of such a beautiful project.

comments.author: klidex
comments.body: Quote from: Kostelooscoin on January 09, 2023, 11:54:36 AMHelloLately, I have created an absolutely sublime crypto casino.Small demo available right here: https://demoscript.online/18 games available, a crispy admin panel and hundreds of options like the biggest online casinos.The source is custom ~50% to have something nice and clean and unique.It is made in PHP with Laravel and for the db it is MongoDB.I will set a quota of 0.01 BTC which seems reasonable to avoid the leeching of such a beautiful project.Looks like the crypto casino you are promoting is pretty good and interesting to follow.However, are there already active users playing or betting at the crypto casino that you are promoting and are there bonuses given to new users who make their first deposit transaction.Or maybe there aren't any users in it yet because the casino is still a new crypto casino.There is one more suggestion from me and maybe many users of this forum have informed and wanted it.If you are promoting a project, it would be better if you use or buy a Copper membership.

comments.author: Yogee
comments.body: Why not allow all games to be tested without logging in? I tried few of the games that accept games in demo mode and speed is decent. I think it could be better but the experience is good enough for a demo. What do you plan to do next? Would you sell it or have a few select to test before officially launching the platform?

comments.author: seoincorporation
comments.body: That's a great user interface, and it's responsive, great job on that one, and it would be nice if you tell us more about the Deposits and Withdrawals, does your engine have its own nodes, or that's a third-party service? Quote from: Kostelooscoin on January 09, 2023, 11:54:36 AMI will set a quota of 0.01 BTC which seems reasonable to avoid the leeching of such a beautiful project.I don't get what's that quota for? is it to test the site? and how much you you want for the project? Not sure if you are selling it, looking for partners, or just launching your project.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: I checked the casino out, it looks nice and decent, operation is good too, pretty fast enough and every thing seemed aligned as it should be. I didn't try playing any of the games though, but I think you did a great job, must have cost you alot of time and effort, but the outcome is indeed worth it. Quote from: seoincorporation on January 09, 2023, 05:33:01 PM~Snip~Quote from: Kostelooscoin on January 09, 2023, 11:54:36 AMI will set a quota of 0.01 BTC which seems reasonable to avoid the leeching of such a beautiful project.I don't get what's that quota for? is it to test the site? and how much you you want for the project? Not sure if you are selling it, looking for partners, or just launching your project.From what I saw in the casino website, I think OP is out to sell it, and the quota he talk about could mean his asking price is 0.01 BTC, if you check the sliding header, there a small button says, "Purchase now", when clicked on, it leads to an account on telegram supposedly belonging to OP.So I have a strong conviction he wants to sell it, but we should still wait for confirmation of this from him though.

comments.author: Blawpaw
comments.body: Quote from: Kostelooscoin on January 09, 2023, 11:54:36 AMHelloLately, I have created an absolutely sublime crypto casino.Small demo available right here: https://demoscript.online/18 games available, a crispy admin panel and hundreds of options like the biggest online casinos.The source is custom ~50% to have something nice and clean and unique.It is made in PHP with Laravel and for the db it is MongoDB.I will set a quota of 0.01 BTC which seems reasonable to avoid the leeching of such a beautiful project.Looks like pretty interesting and well developed casino. Now all you need os to make some serious investment in publicizing the site and you should get a lot of gamblers in no time. Just add new options and new games once on a while and things should go big. Best of luck for your casino!

comments.author: cabron
comments.body: Quote from: seoincorporation on January 09, 2023, 05:33:01 PMThat's a great user interface, and it's responsive, great job on that one, and it would be nice if you tell us more about the Deposits and Withdrawals, does your engine have its own nodes, or that's a third-party service? Quote from: Kostelooscoin on January 09, 2023, 11:54:36 AMI will set a quota of 0.01 BTC which seems reasonable to avoid the leeching of such a beautiful project.I don't get what's that quota for? is it to test the site? and how much you you want for the project? Not sure if you are selling it, looking for partners, or just launching your project.He is selling it. The purchase bottom on the demo site prompts to telegram @script017. I also don't understand that quota, maybe he means the price of this script is 0.01BTC? The script is full of games already. Is it possible for OP to provide a list of casinos that uses the script? Potential buyers probably are interested in modifying the theme of the casino. Maybe he could show the sample casinos.

comments.author: Agbe
comments.body: Quote from: Kostelooscoin on January 09, 2023, 11:54:36 AMHelloLately, I have created an absolutely sublime crypto casino.Small demo available right here: https://demoscript.online/18 games available, a crispy admin panel and hundreds of options like the biggest online casinos.The source is custom ~50% to have something nice and clean and unique.It is made in PHP with Laravel and for the db it is MongoDB.I will set a quota of 0.01 BTC which seems reasonable to avoid the leeching of such a beautiful project.You are welcome to the world bitcointalk forum. Fell free to participate in any topic you can discuss well. And bring good things to the forum. I browsed through the website, and I discovered that the site is still under development and it is almost finished. There are some casinos that have finished the development while some not available. It is a very good start of it. I will want you to develop your ANN thread so the features will look nice though since you are a new comer in the forum, it is a gradual process. Once again, you welcome.

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Quote from: Kostelooscoin on January 09, 2023, 11:54:36 AMHelloLately, I have created an absolutely sublime crypto casino.Small demo available right here: https://demoscript.online/-cut-That looks pretty sleek, and works smoothly. But can we have some screenshots from the admin panel? Like what configurations will admin have and how easy is the setup for someone who isn't very tech-savvy.I don't have the bankroll for runnin a casino but i know people who have, so in order to sell them something like this i would like all the possible details.

comments.body: Quote from: Yogee on January 09, 2023, 05:13:04 PMWhy not allow all games to be tested without logging in? I tried few of the games that accept games in demo mode and speed is decent. I think it could be better but the experience is good enough for a demo. What do you plan to do next? Would you sell it or have a few select to test before officially launching the platform?It looks like for some games you have to log in and create an account, but to play Plinko games you don't need to enter the casino and create an account, I think it's safer to test the game without having to have an account there and it's open to the public. For example, I tried playing Plinko.

comments.author: traderethereum
comments.body: I guess @OP wants to sell his site with 18 gambling games.@OP needs to explain in more detail what he means so we don't misunderstand what he wants.It's a website that might be ready to launch, but first, the new casino owner needs to modify a few things in the script.Maybe @OP opens a bid price of 0.01 BTC and will sell it at the highest price from the bidder.I hope that @ OP can come back and explain it in more detail.

comments.author: Daltonik
comments.body: Quote from: piebeyb on January 10, 2023, 05:58:37 AMQuote from: Yogee on January 09, 2023, 05:13:04 PMWhy not allow all games to be tested without logging in? I tried few of the games that accept games in demo mode and speed is decent. I think it could be better but the experience is good enough for a demo. What do you plan to do next? For example, I tried playing Plinko.In fact, this is a demo mode that is presented for testing the script, but as far as I understand, in order to get a demo balance to continue the game, you need to register and try to play by activating the demo mode and requesting a demo balance, but you do not need to make deposits.

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: i tried to check out the demo and it requires a huge lot of time to get loaded. At some point, I gave up and left the site.Quote from: klidex on January 09, 2023, 04:55:36 PMHowever, are there already active users playing or betting at the crypto casino that you are promoting and are there bonuses given to new users who make their first deposit transaction.OP isn't launching a casino here. Rather, he is promoting his casino script which he wants to sell here. Why would they give a bonus and to whom? Quote from: traderethereum on January 10, 2023, 07:00:38 AMI guess @OP wants to sell his site with 18 gambling games.People don't care to read the details, simply check the headline and jump into making a comment.

At some point, I gave up and left the site.<...> I don't know why your site doesn't load, I tried it again with both VPN and without it, everything loads quickly without any delays, but perhaps these are features and limitations on the part of the provider.

comments.body: Quote from: traderethereum on January 10, 2023, 07:00:38 AMI guess @OP wants to sell his site with 18 gambling games.@OP needs to explain in more detail what he means so we don't misunderstand what he wants.It's a website that might be ready to launch, but first, the new casino owner needs to modify a few things in the script.Maybe @OP opens a bid price of 0.01 BTC and will sell it at the highest price from the bidder.I hope that @ OP can come back and explain it in more detail.It's how I understood it also. comments.author: suzanne5223
comments.body: Quote from: traderethereum on January 10, 2023, 07:00:38 AMI guess @OP wants to sell his site with 18 gambling games.@OP needs to explain in more detail what he means so we don't misunderstand what he wants.It's a website that might be ready to launch, but first, the new casino owner needs to modify a few things in the script.Maybe @OP opens a bid price of 0.01 BTC and will sell it at the highest price from the bidder.I hope that @ OP can come back and explain it in more detail.If you look through the OP page and the demo site he claimed to have created which he also include his telegram ID for communication you'll see that he's totally planning to sell the demo script but I consider this to be a dangerous bargain due to the OP reputation and price of the bid since the bargain will be off the forum. It is better to go for a reputable company than the anonymous user that hardly knows on this forum.

comments.author: Kakmakr
comments.body: Some of the games looks like a "white label" version of the Stake.com original games.... and we are seeing a lot of these copycat sites ..popping up everywhere. I was hoping to see some real originality in those games... but it's just too similar to all the rest.  Is this a clever method to "sell" a white label version of your casino.... or are you genuinely looking for inputs to improve it? One thing that you might consider adding ... will be a PvP element to all those games.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: You have good features on your casino but the interface is a bit dull. It will be nice improving the colour features. This looks like you wanting a review on your casino you know but it will be better you put it up in that review way so as to get accurate information on your casino. From the way you sound, are you thinking of putting it up for sale?

comments.author: Yatsan
comments.body: Quote from: Kakmakr on January 10, 2023, 12:27:46 PMSome of the games looks like a "white label" version of the Stake.com original games.... and we are seeing a lot of these copycat sites ..popping up everywhere. I was hoping to see some real originality in those games... but it's just too similar to all the rest.  Is this a clever method to "sell" a white label version of your casino.... or are you genuinely looking for inputs to improve it? One thing that you might consider adding ... will be a PvP element to all those games.  It is quite becoming a norm, unfortunately. Well in reality, they are all on the same category offering gambling activities with slight differences; simply following what's selling to the audiences and what are not. What's unfortunate is the design and UI to the newer ones in this industry which makes 'copying' obvious just to attract existing players of the gambling site being copied. I'm not sure if these 'copied gambling sites' are aware that players won't moved towards their platform if the 'original' one is performing well and much more if it don't ('coz the negative image will be passed down to them). Given the similarities, for those who are just starting to introduce their own sites, the best way to attract players are thru promotions and bonuses, followed by good platform UI and ofcourse, in game support from devs for future developments.New concepts such as PVPs would be a good idea but I guess majority of gamblers are just not into such concept.
